item.description:
A new event!
Have you visited the Wadsworth Atheneum recently? It has a magnificent collection!
Sunday, March 1st, come to the Wadsworth Atheneum in Hartford to enjoy a live jazz Sunday brunch, museum visit and German film Emma's Gluck
Brief plot description:

An eccentric young woman
becomes involved with a terminally
ill man who crashes into her pig
farm in this touching and amusing
German box office hit.
2006. Germany. 90 min. Not Rated. Subtitles.
Directed by Sven Taddicken.

Come for any or all of the event!
11:00 Museum visit ($10 entry, less for seniors/students,free for members & with Bank of America credit card)
12:10 Brunch in cafe (menu says $8-$12 for most things)
1:00 Gallery tour for those who want of the Ballets Russes collection
2:00 Film showing ($9 entry, less for seniors/students)

When you RSVP, please say which part of it you would like to go to. Danke!
item.name: Brunch, Film, Museum!
